I love Dragon Goes House-Hunting, but I think my favorite anime is The Ancient Magus' Bride. The way the characters interact feels kind of realistic, even though Chise makes some bad decisions early-on. How about you guys?
Currently my favorite is a tie between Bungou Stray Dogs and Idolish7. I've fallen in love with so many of the characters from both shows and it's fun watching them go through shenanigans together
Do you have a favorite character from either of those shows? I really like Akutagawa and Dazai. If I had to pick one, I'd go with Dazai.
From idolish7 my favorite is tied between Momo and Yuki. At this point I should just say my favorite character is Re:vale
From Bungou Stray Dogs, my favorite changes around a lot, it's impossible to pick just one
It depends on what I've watched or read recently and what little moments are currently rattling around in my head
So I'll go with the silly answer of Karl lol

Wow! Sorry if this is too personal, but do dragons keep growing after they become adults?

That's totally alright.  Yes, dragons are like snakes in that we continuously grow as we age.  When it's time to shed our skin, we light a fire and sleep in it.  The fire burns away the old skin, leaving our scales all shiny and helping us heal any wounds.
